solution_line_template: Cheryl walked {miles_per_hour} miles x {hours_walked} hours = <<{miles_per_hour}*{hours_walked}={distance_away}>>{distance_away} miles.

Once Cheryl was {distance_away} miles away, she walked back home, another {distance_away} miles, so she walked {distance_away} + {distance_away} = <<{distance_away}+{distance_away}={total_miles_walked}>>{total_miles_walked} miles.
